name: Dungeons and Plants
description:
Help Jimmy to get out of this cave, water the plants and dodge the mice!
Watch out for the lava!

 
Artist: https://www.artstation.com/samuelazeredo
Programmer: https://www.instagram.com/mo_chill_a/
Audio: https://www.alandalcastagne.com/

WASD / Arrows - Move

SPACE - Jump

E - Interact

ESC - Pause
